resources.string: Location is not available now, Please configure time manually.
AutoDark need this receiver to wake up in time and do the switch job" "\n If you are using some kind of optimizer/battery saver app or something like that, please add AutoDark to their white list."
Turns on from sunset to sunrise
Use your GPS coordinates to calculate sunset/sunrise time, this requires location permission.
Provide by android, force apps into dark mode \nNot recommend, will set some apps on fire.
Will turn on dark mode from sunset to sunrise.
Will turn off dark mode at %1$s
Will turn on dark mode at %1$s
Failed to set darkMode: Permission denied!

Use your PC/Mac to grant ADB permission." "
 First Please read this guide (its written for Greenify but procedure are basically the same)." "
 After you read the guide and know how to use ADB, click the share/copy button below to send the command code to your PC/Mac." "
 After that run the command code to grant permission. "
 Finally, you can click the check button to finish this grant procedure."
Failed! make sure you typed right command.
If your device is rooted, you can grant permission with root now.
AutoDark need your permission to changing the system dark mode. Use one of three ways below to grant that permission.
